titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Hievvorth at the funerall of Edmund Warneford Esq. By Thomas Hauskins minister of Gods word. On the 24. of August. 1649.
titleStmt.author: Hauskins, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "Jan. 7. 1652"; the second '1' in the imprint has been crossed out.
Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library (Early English books) and the British Library (Thomason Tracts).
